_header: Harkeneth now I will you tell / As Matthew sayeth in this gospel
_description: Gospel ‘In festo Cathed. sancti Petri’, in ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Herkeneþ now I wol ȝow telleAs Mathew seiþ in
                    þis gospelle…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…In to þat ilke gloriouse blisseHe þat vs wrouhte us
                    þider wisse. Amen.

Doyle,  I. A.,

             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

         81 (1888): 83-114, 300-21: 105.

                    þis gospelle…
